tirank.Model.initial_model_paraÔÉÅ

tirank.Model.initial_model_para(savePath, nhead=2, nhid1=96, nhid2=8, n_output=32, nlayers=3, n_pred=1, dropout=0.5, mode='Cox', infer_mode='SC', encoder_type='MLP')[source]ÔÉÅ

Initializes and saves the model hyperparameter configuration.

This function reads the input data dimensions (e.g., number of gene pairs) and spatial cluster dimensions, combines them with the user-defined hyperparameters, and saves the complete configuration as ‚Äòmodel_para.pkl‚Äô.

Parameters:

  • savePath (str) ‚Äì The main project directory path.

  • nhead (int, optional) ‚Äì Number of heads for Transformer encoder. Defaults to 2.

  • nhid1 (int, optional) ‚Äì Hidden dimension for the encoder. Defaults to 96.

  • nhid2 (int, optional) ‚Äì Hidden dimension for the predictor heads. Defaults to 8.

  • n_output (int, optional) ‚Äì Output dimension of the encoder (embedding size). Defaults to 32.

  • nlayers (int, optional) ‚Äì Number of layers in the encoder. Defaults to 3.

  • n_pred (int, optional) ‚Äì Output dimension of the predictor (e.g., 1 for Cox/Regression, 2 for binary Classification). Defaults to 1.

  • dropout (float, optional) ‚Äì Dropout rate. Defaults to 0.5.

  • mode (str, optional) ‚Äì Analysis mode (‚ÄòCox‚Äô, ‚ÄòClassification‚Äô, ‚ÄòRegression‚Äô). Defaults to ‚ÄúCox‚Äù.

  • infer_mode (str, optional) ‚Äì Inference data type (‚ÄòSC‚Äô or ‚ÄòST‚Äô). Defaults to ‚ÄúSC‚Äù.

  • encoder_type (str, optional) ‚Äì Type of encoder to use (‚ÄòMLP‚Äô, ‚ÄòTransformer‚Äô, ‚ÄòDenseNet‚Äô). Defaults to ‚ÄúMLP‚Äù.

Returns:

None
